A comparison bioavailability two product provide insight different process food matrix influence anthocyanin bioavailability metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: Anthocyanin & Phenolic Acids Bioavailability & Antioxidant Capacity After Consumption Purple Wheat Products Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This study determine bioavailability anthocyanins phenolic compound two purple wheat product , i.e . bran-enriched wholegrain purple wheat cracker bran-enriched wholegrain purple wheat granola bar . Crackers example baked/ process product . The purple wheat granola bar example food product require much less intensive preparation cooking , compare cracker . A comparison bioavailability two product provide insight different process food matrix influence anthocyanin bioavailability metabolism . The study crossover investigation 8 men 8 woman adhere low anthocyanin low phenolic diet duration complete 2 postprandial study visit , random order , consume either cracker granola bar . Blood urine collect baseline postprandially analysis anthocyanins metabolites phenolic acid determination antioxidant capacity .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 27 kg/m2 Generally healthy determine screen questionnaire Nonsmoking Non moderate alcohol drinker ( Typical consumption le 5 drink per sit 14 per week ) Pregnant breastfeed female History major disease medical condition , include disorder gastrointestinal system food intolerance Taking prescription medication ( include hormonal contraceptive ) counter medication prescribe medical professional Taking natural health product dietary supplement , multivitamin low anthocyanins phenolic acid Oral antibiotic use past 3 month Any food allergy , anaphylactic lifethreatening allergy food otherwise Smokers use recreational drug ( marijuana , magic mushroom , etc ) Elite train athlete Following vegan vegetarian diet
